forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High near 15C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. High 59F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm this evening, then some lingering showers still possible overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with a possible thunderstorm early, then variable clouds overnight with still a chance of showers. Low near 50F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Flooding is possible in flood prone areas.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
